description:
It´s the year 2078 and you find yourself in a tiny little island. Explore your surroundings  in order to find information that will help you understand what´s happening.

This game is a brief FPS piece that takes place in a (sort-of) post-apocalyptic situation.  The visual and sound discoveries will make you aware of the world you now live in. It ´s  a window to our own future.
